title: The perils of addiction and the pillars of recovery
body: It’s estimated that more than 20 million Americans struggle with at least one addiction, most of whom do not receive treatment. It’s a crisis that’s been elevated by the pandemic, with many people relapsing or falling into new cycles of addiction.  knows the perils of substance abuse – leaving his career of 14 years to focus on mending his mental and physical wellbeing. The educator and author of “ joined us us to discuss the 7 pillars of recovery.
